messages.content: What's the total outstanding balance?

{"text": "The total outstanding balance this pay cycle is **$996.90** across **6 employees**.", "type": "response", "richContent": {"type": "data-card", "data": {"value": "$996.90", "label": "Outstanding Balance", "detail": "6 employees"}}, "actions": [{"label": "View Breakdown", "type": "show-table", "data": "outstanding"}, {"label": "Go to Transfers", "type": "navigate", "target": "/transfers"}], "followUp": "Would you like to see the breakdown by employee?"}

Transfer", "$196.60"]]}}, "actions": [{"label": "View All Transfers", "type": "navigate", "target": "/transfers"}]}
What's our adoption rate?

{"text": "I can help you with the **Transfers Report**. This includes all transfers, fees, and payment methods.", "type": "response", "actions": [{"label": "Download CSV", "type": "download", "format": "csv", "reportId": "transfers"}, {"label": "Download PDF", "type": "download", "format": "pdf", "reportId": "transfers"}, {"label": "View in Portal", "type": "navigate", "target": "/downloads"}]}
What reports are available?

{"text": "Here are the available reports:", "type": "response", "richContent": {"type": "report-list", "data": [{"id": "transfers", "name": "Transfers Report", "description": "All transfers, fees, and methods"}, {"id": "savings", "name": "Save Accounts Report", "description": "Account balances and trends"}, {"id": "reconciliation", "name": "Reconciliation Report", "description": "Payroll reconciliation data"}, {"id": "outstanding", "name": "Outstanding Balances Report", "description": "Employees with outstanding balances"}, {"id": "feedback", "name": "Employee Feedback Report", "description": "Satisfaction scores and feedback"}, {"id": "impact", "name": "Total Impact Report", "description": "ROI and financial wellness impact"}]}, "actions": [{"label": "Go to Reports", "type": "navigate", "target": "/downloads"}]}
Take me to employees page
{"text": "Taking you to **Employees**...", "type": "response", "actions": [{"label": "Go to Employees", "type": "navigate", "target": "/employees", "autoExecute": true}]}
What's the satisfaction score?

{"text": "The overall satisfaction score is **4.7/5.0** based on 892 responses.", "type": "response", "richContent": {"type": "table", "data": {"headers": ["Metric", "Score"], "rows": [["Overall Satisfaction", "4.7/5.0"], ["Ease of Use", "4.8/5.0"], ["Financial Wellbeing", "4.5/5.0"], ["Recommendation Score", "4.6/5.0"], ["Support Quality", "4.4/5.0"]]}}, "actions": [{"label": "View Impact Stats", "type": "navigate", "target": "/impact-stats"}]}
Hi

{"text": "Hi! I'm Penny, your EWA assistant. I can help you with:

‚Ä¢ **Balances** - "What's the total outstanding balance?" or "Does Sarah owe anything?"
‚Ä¢ **Employees** - "Is Michael Chen enrolled?" or "Look up Emily Rodriguez"
‚Ä¢ **Transfers** - "How many transfers this month?" or "Show transfer stats"
‚Ä¢ **Savings** - "How much have employees saved?" or "Who are the top savers?"
‚Ä¢ **Adoption** - "What's our adoption rate?" or "How many people enrolled?"
‚Ä¢ **Reports** - "Generate a transfers report" or "I need a savings report"
‚Ä¢ **Navigation** - "Take me to the employees page"

Just ask me anything!", "type": "greeting"}
Thanks!
{"text": "You're welcome! Let me know if you need anything else.", "type": "acknowledgment"}
How many employees do we have?

{"text": "There are **20 employees** in the system.

Out of 2,643 total eligible employees company-wide, 1,012 have adopted the EWA program (38% adoption rate).", "type": "response", "richContent": {"type": "data-card", "data": {"value": "2,643", "label": "Eligible Employees", "detail": "1,012 enrolled (38%)"}}, "actions": [{"label": "View Employees", "type": "navigate", "target": "/employees"}]}
